TopicTitle: is a Jr. Rocket Scientist better than a Sr. Spacecraft Engineer??

Articles.Content: Yesterday I was a Sr. Spacecraft Engineer today I'm a Jr. Rocket Scientist, was that a promotion??

I think I understand what you're saying. The user titles can be a bit confusing, but they're based on your post count. So yes, a Jr. Rocket Scientist has more posts than a Sr. Spacecraft Engineer, unless you've given yourself a custom user title.

Oh, I see. You talk about the auto-user title. Sorry, hehe, I didnÃ‚Â´t really get this.

But I guess scientists seem to be worth more than engineers....
Moved over to the Kerbal Network forum, as this is about forum functionality.
You should totally customize your user title, it's all the rage these days!

It happened at my 500th post.\

Jr. Rocket Scientist make me think of Robert Goddard's nephew.

Sr. Spacecraft Engineer makes me think of Geordi Laforge.

It happened at my 500th post.

It always does, the standard user titles are determined by post count. Here's the list of default ones:

0 Curious George

5 Bottle Rocketeer

25 Rocketeer

50 Rocketry Enthusiast

100 Spacecraft Engineer

250 Sr. Spacecraft Engineer

500 Junior Rocket Scientist

750 Rocket Scientist

1000 Senior Rocket Scientist

1500 Capsule Communicator

3000 Flight Director
